US President Barack Obama reveals the death of Osama bin Laden at a firefight at his Pakistan compound.
Hundreds of Americans celebrate bin Laden's death outside the White House and Times Square.
Witnesses say Gadhafi's loyalist forces assail western Misrata only a day after attacking the city's port area.
Syria's state news agency says security forces arrested hundreds and killed ten others in an effort to crush protests.
Gulf officials try to salvage a deal to ease Yemeni President Ali Abdullah Saleh out of power.
Israelis have a moment of silence in honor of Holocaust Remembrance Day.
